author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: هر منصفی شهادت داده و میدهد که این مظلوم از اوّل ظهور کل را بافق اعلی دعوت نموده و از شقاوت و بغضا و بغی و فحشا منع فرموده مع‌ذلک اهل اعتساف وارد آوردند آنچه را که قلم از ذکرش عاجز و قاصر است حقّ حیات و راحت از برای کل خواسته ولکن عباد در قتل احبّا و سفک دم مطهّرش فتوی داده‌اند
translation: Every unbiased observer will readily admit that, ever since the dawn of His Revelation, this wronged One hath invited all mankind to turn their faces towards the Dayspring of Glory, and hath forbidden corruption, hatred, oppression, and wickedness. And yet, behold what the hand of the oppressor hath wrought! No pen dare describe his tyranny. Though the purpose of Him Who is the Eternal Truth hath been to confer everlasting life upon all men, and ensure their security and peace, yet witness how they have arisen to shed the blood of His loved ones, and have pronounced on Him the sentence of death.
